sign-up.privacy-policy: I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

sign-in.tree-times-desc: You entered the wrong password three times. Please try again after 24 hours.

confirm-email.title: Email confirmation
confirm-email.description: A confirmation code was sent to the email you provided.

confirm-phone.title: Phone confirmation
confirm-phone.description: A confirmation code was sent to the phone number you provided.

verify-email.title: Enter code from email
verify-email.description: A confirmation code text message was sent to the email you provided.

verify-phone.title: Enter code from SMS
verify-phone.description: A confirmation code text message was sent to the phone number you provided.

code-2fa.title: Enter code from Google 2FA App
code-2fa.description: A confirmation code is in your Google Authenticator App.

password-recovery.title: Password recovery
password-recovery.description: A password renewal link will be sent to the email you specified.

password-recovery-sent.description: A link to change your password has been sent to {{var}}.

new-password.title: New password
new-password.description: Please enter a new password and confirm it.

password-changed.title: Password changed
password-changed.description-error: Password reset link is not correct.

complete-registration.title: Complete registration
complete-registration.description: You must complete registration of your account, to complete press continue
